title: Spiced pumpkin muffins
ingredients: ['190g plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '125ml vegetable oil', '425g pumpkin puree', '110g cream cheese', 'pumpkin or sunflower seeds, as garnish (optional)']
